sentences.sContent: They throw out all of these behaviors randomly.
sentences.sContent_eng: They throw out all of these behaviors randomly.
sentences.sCn: 它们的这些行为都是随机的。

sentences.sContent: It mimics a memory leak by randomly placing some of these arrays (~20% of them) into a list.
sentences.sContent_eng: It mimics a memory leak by randomly placing some of these arrays (~20% of them) into a list.
sentences.sCn: 它通过随机将这些数组的一部分（大约 20%）放入一个列表来模拟内存泄漏。

sentences.sContent: ...Fazio’s Indiana study found that three times as many randomly assigned interracial roommates were no longer living together at the end of the semester...
...That same study found that randomly assigned interracial roommates at Ohio State broke up before the end of the quarter about twice as often as same-race roommates...
...What did the study find about randomly assigned interracial roommates at Ohio State University...
...Just randomly ask a student what he or she is busily engaged in doing...

synos.tran: 随便地，任意地；无目的，胡乱地；未加计划地

words.tran: [数] 随机的；任意的；胡乱的
[数] 随机化，不规则分布；随机选择
使随机化；做任意排列（randomize的过去分词）
使随机化；（使）作任意排列或不规则分布
